projects.title: Tenzies
projects.description: An interactive dice game where players roll until all dice show the same number. Features a timer and high score tracking with localStorage.In this project I learned how to use React useState hook and persistent data storage. The hardest part was implementing a real-time timer and integrating localStorage for tracking high scores.
